title: 如何关闭 mcmmo血量显示
author: 迷の十六

replies.author: 雾晨丶破晓
replies.txt_content: MCMMO不是技能插件嘛....哪来的血量显示（╯‵□′）╯ノ┻━┻

replies.author: 迷の十六
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 二白丶
replies.txt_content: 你找到mcmmo的那个插件文件夹，找到里面的显血把true换成f什么的就行了

replies.author: 蓝之魂
replies.txt_content:
Mob_Healthbar:
    # Display_Type: Default display for mob health bars - HEARTS, BAR, or DISABLED
    # Display_Time: Amount of time (in seconds) to display. To display permanently, set to -1
    Display_Type: BAR
    Display_Time: 1
应该不用过多说明了吧
